title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute, soft, and cozy, with great quality and good warmth.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Bow Sweater — So Many Compliments!
items.body: This bow sweater is the cutest — I got so many compliments on it during the holidays! It comes in multiple colors, is warm, true to size, and feels great quality. Cozy, stylish, and perfect for festive occasions. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Amy M. Sweet

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sweater
items.body: True to size, sooooo soft!! Sleeves are long with a cute bubble! Definitely will order again!!! Read more
items.author: jamie welsh

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Adorable!
items.body: I love this sweater! The color is the perfect soft pastel and the white bows give it the sweetest touch. The material is surprisingly soft and cozy…not itchy at all and it has a nice stretch that makes it super comfortable to wear all day. Read more
items.author: Jeana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a little big
items.body: Very cute and made well. If you’re petite, you could probably size down. I ordered xl and could have worn a large Read more
items.author: Angie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Very happy this was the one I picked! I needed something for comfy Christmas family photos that was also pink to match the theme. This is VERY soft and true to size. I got a medium (I am 5’5” and between 155-160lbs). It looks a bit oversized but not like I’m swimming in it so I’m comfortable wearing leggings if I change my mind from relaxed pants- it will cover my bum. The sleeves are also perfect length-wise and so far have stayed up when I instinctually keep pulling them up. It’s also not super thin so I don’t have to wear a cami under it and it seems warm as-is. Read more
items.author: FXlady

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size down
items.body: I usually love this brand but this sweater wasn’t for me. It is huge so you definitely want to size down. I love a good oversized fit but this wasn’t flattering at all. It is big everywhere. The sleeves and entire sweater are wide and long. The material has a very polyester look and feel but is nice and thick. I loved the brown color and cute bows but that is where my love ended. It might be a different story if I would have gotten a smaller size but I won’t be keeping it. Read more
items.author: Matt Griffin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and Stylish!
items.body: Adorable and so fun to wear. I paired it with my brown leggings with brown boots. Read more
items.author: Tamara Webber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: What a fun sweater. It’s thick but not heavy. Super soft and slightly oversized. I’m wearing a medium and I’m 155 lbs and 5.6. It does cover the hips and great with leggings or a mini skirt Read more
items.author: KAREN PAPPAS

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, Beige, Light Pink, Blue Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
